title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models via simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers. Same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style). Docker one-liner to chat with local models in browser.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, prompt templates and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub-Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API for chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete, embeddings.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama HTTP API with strong typing and tokio support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot frontend that talks to your local Ollama instance over REST.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on to run Ollama inside your HA instance and expose LLM services to automations.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim library wrapping the Ollama REST API with async HTTP and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer behaviour for streaming completions into Phoenix LiveView apps.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server that forwards channel DMs to a local Ollama instance and posts replies back.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for talking to Ollama; useful for desktop/mobile apps wanting local LLM access.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a sidebar chat powered by a local Ollama model and can insert answers into notes.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example showing how to scale Ollama models behind a Ray cluster for high-throughput serving.
